testcase.classname: User registration and message compose functionality in English language
testcase.name: Verify that the user is able to complete the registration after filling and submitting the form
testcase.system-out: Given user should be on the home page.......................................passed When user clicks on the Signup! link........................................passed Then Registration page should display.......................................passed Then enter all madatory info "Follow Course", "rewewre","qweq", "asasacT@testgg.com","TestSDETRam_c", "Test_c", "Test_c".passed And click on the Submit button..............................................passed Then Signup confirmation page is displaying with user info "rewewre","qweq".passed

testcase.classname: User registration and message compose functionality in English language
testcase.name: Verify that the user is able to compose and send the message
testcase.system-out: Given Login with valid name.................................................passed When click on the user icon.................................................passed And click on the link "Inbox"...............................................passed And click on the compose....................................................passed And Enter Send To, Subject, Message "virat" ,"Test", "Test".................passed And click on the Send Message...............................................passed Then Message should be send successfully....................................passed
